attributes.action: Fund the RAF properly and ensure its aircraft are safe to fly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the latest incident reagrding an RAF Nimrod having a fuel leak, when will the governmkent listen to all its critics and FUND THE RAF PROPERLY.  They need to listen to the advice of experts and bodies such as the UKNDA and properly fund our armed forces.  To fail to do this is a NATIONAL DISGRACE
